Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orlando Magic managed to pull off a solid win against the Toronto Raptors, taking the game with a final score of 106-97.
The team currently sits in fourth place in the Eastern Conference, boasting a record of 21-15.
Others: Jalen Suggs suffered a back injury during the game and was pulled off the court in a wheelchair.
Suggs was dealing with back spasms and the team will take a closer look at his condition the following day.
Suggs has been posting impressive numbersâ€”a career-high of 16.8 points per game, along with 4.2 rebounds and nearly 30 minutes of play per game.
Suggs has no known history of back problems and fans are anxiously awaiting further news about his condition.
